title: 2021 Sandwich Props and Remembering Our Friend Tara Deeker
itunes:title: 2021 Sandwich Props and Remembering Our Friend Tara Deeker
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal and Marc Sessler are back together, apart, again for the week 1 Thursday Night Football PREVIEW (8:01). The season is officially here! The heroes give their sandwich predictions for the upcoming season (25:13) and Dave Dameshek joins the show to remember our beloved friend, Tara Deeker (1:01:09). 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
